body_html:
Don't merge yet. The comment saying that "ATen doesn't dispatch the method correctly" was really VariableType.cpp that didn't allow sparse types in checked_cast. I'll try to simplify that part of the code and see if it fails (and yes, will file a bug report otherwise @ezyang).

@ezyang The version is not needed because it's not used anywhere (look at the full code before the changes)

body:
Don't merge yet. The comment saying that "ATen doesn't dispatch the method correctly" was really VariableType.cpp that didn't allow sparse types in `checked_cast`. I'll try to simplify that part of the code and see if it fails (and yes, will file a bug report otherwise @ezyang).

@ezyang The version is not needed because it's not used anywhere (look at the full code before the changes)
